title: maravAmal iru
sahitya:
maravAmal iru manamE haran maghanait-tirupparangiri vElanai


anupallavi

  kaDai guNamAgiya kAma krOdha lObhak-kashaDugaL nIngiDa nija jnAnam OngiDa


caraNam    Aru talaittarum Arumukha vElavan arakkar kAlan uNmai anbarkk-anukUlan
vIru tarum murugan virumbum kali varadan vEda OmkArap-poruL Odum guruparan
